fields.name: Parameters
fields.value:
`generate` - What to generate for the entity
`identifier` - The identifier of the entity in %s:%s format
`texture_file` - Entity texture file in PNG format
`model_file` - Entity model file in JSON format
`is_spawnable` - Can the entity be spawned using spawn eggs?
`is_experimental` - Is the entity experimental?
`basic_beh` - Pick "True" or dire things may happen
`spawn_egg_overlay` - The overlay color of the spawn egg in hex format
`spawn_egg_base` - The base color of the spawn egg in hex format
`material` - The entity material
